confirm-email.description: We’ve sent a verification email to {email}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to access the platform.
confirm-email.description-part1: We’ve sent a verification email to
confirm-email.description-part2: Please check your inbox and click the verification link to access the platform.
confirm-email.no-email: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or request a new one.
confirm-email.title: Verify Your Email
confirm-email.wait-to-resend: You can resend the email in

email-confirmed.description: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
email-confirmed.title: Email Verified!

signin.description: Enter your email and password to sign in
signin.title: Sign In

signup.description: Enter your email and password to create an account
signup.title: Create Account

chat.archive.confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. The conversation and all messages will be permanently archived.
chat.archive.confirm.title: Archive Conversation
chat.delete.confirm.description: This action cannot be undone. The conversation and all messages will be permanently deleted.
chat.delete.confirm.title: Delete Conversation
chat.delete.permanent.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this chat? This action cannot be undone.
chat.delete.permanent.title: Permanently Delete
chat.edit.description: Change the name of this conversation to identify it more easily.
chat.edit.title: Edit Chat Name

share-dialog.description: This conversation may contain personal information.
share-dialog.privacy-notice: Your name, custom instructions, and any message you add after sharing will remain private.
share-dialog.title: Share Public Link to Chat
share-dialog.warning: Take a moment to review the content before sharing the link.
